title: Generate Stocastic Branching Networks
text: purpose package generate Stochastic Branching Networks (SBNs), frequently used represent branching structure rivers ecological models. functions package rely heavily igraph package. fundamental unit SBN package downstream directed igraph object. package contains functions generating manipulating networks. functions also work river networks generated packages, subsequently converted igraph objects (e.g. OCNs.

title: Generate Stocastic Branching Networks
text: can quickly calculate Strahler order vertices network.

title: Generate Stocastic Branching Networks
text: quick plotting generally used ggraph tree layout. far can tell, tree algorithm doesn’t play nice downstream weighted network, therefore plotting purposes need reverse network upstream weighted one works fine. bit fiddly, haven’t found simple “---box” alternative yet. Another option generate vertex coordinates (OCNet ), haven’t gotten around implementing .

title: Convert to a downstream directed network — sbn_dwn_nwk
code: if (FALSE) { g <- sbn_create(10, 0.7) g2 <- igraph::as.undirected(g) sbn_dwn_nwk(g2, mouth = 1) }

what: Convert SBN to various adjacency matrix formats — sbn_to_mtx

text: Convert downstream directed SBN various adjacency matrix distance matrix formats.

title: Convert SBN to various adjacency matrix formats — sbn_to_mtx
code: sbn_to_mtx(   g,   method = c("dwn_mtx", "undir_mtx", "up_mtx", "v2v_dist_up", "v2v_dist_dwn",     "v2v_dist_undir", "v2v_dist_dwn"),   unconnected = Inf,   weights = NULL )

title: Convert SBN to various adjacency matrix formats — sbn_to_mtx
text: g SBN method One "dwn_mtx", adjacency matrix downstream directed SBN, "up_mtx", adjacency matrix upstream directed SBN, "undir_mtx", adjacency matrix  undirected SBN "v2v_dist", adjacency matrix vertex vertex distances. unconnected generating vertext--vertex distance matrices, value used unconnected elements. example, downstream directed network, upstream links considered unconnected. Default value Inf options possible, NA 0. weights Passed igraph::shortest.paths(). Possibly numeric vector giving edge weights. NULL`` graph weight edge attribute, attribute used. NA` weights used (even graph weight attribute).

title: Convert SBN to various adjacency matrix formats — sbn_to_mtx
